programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station

programme.title: Cosmic Rays

programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E01, In Shoreditch, 1963, the Doctor’s past begins to catch up with him at the Totter’s Lane junkyard where his adventures began - and to where an old terror is returning.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Resurrection Of The Daleks, S01E04, As the prison station survivors fight the invaders, the Dalek agents on Earth take extreme measures to protect the time corridor from being used by the Doctor’s friends.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E02, Renegade Daleks battle Imperial Daleks for control of the Hand of Omega and Ace takes them on single-handedly at Coal Hill School, while Ratcliffe makes his move.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani, S06E01, Gun-runners are on Androzani Minor, supplying the rebellious android-builder Sharez Jek.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor discovers the difference between the two Dalek factions and why they want a stellar manipulator. He hopes Captain Gilmore's people are up to the task ahead.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani, S06E02, Salateen tells Peri and the Doctor they are dying from spectrox tomaemia.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E04, The streets of East London shake under a civil war bering fought between the Daleks, as the Doctor forces the Dalek Emperor to reveal himself to be Davros, waging one last battle.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani, S06E03, Jek believes Peri will fall in love with him and the Doctor is caught by the gunrunners.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Happiness Patrol, S07E01, The Happiness Patrol walk the streets of Terra Alpha, destroying all the killjoys, on the orders of the despotic Helen A. And in the Kandy Kitchen, something terrible lurks...
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Caves of Androzani, S06E04, Morgus is ruined, and Jek goes on a murderous rampage.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Happiness Patrol, S07E02, The Doctor escapes the Kandyman while Ace meets the Pipe People. Later, fleeing for her life, Ace is captured and selected to audition for the Happiness Patrol.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma, S01E01, The mysterious Professor Edgeworth has kidnapped twin human child genii, Romulus and Remus, and Hugo Lang holds the new Doctor responsible for the destruction of his spaceship.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Happiness Patrol, S07E03, As the Doctor leads the Pipe People towards reclaiming their world, Helen A faces betrayal from those closest to her and the Kandyman comes to a sticky end.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma, S01E02, On Jaconda, Mestor’s cruel domination over the planet's population continues while on Titan Three, the Doctor seems to have been blown up in a booby-trapped building.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E01, As UNIT is transporting a nuclear warhead around Carbury, knights in armour arrive to continue waging a war that began thousands of years ago, but in a wholly different dimension.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Twin Dilemma, S01E03, Mestor claims that all he wants is for the Sylvest twins to help him repopulate his home planet but the Doctor knows there’s more to this than meets the eye...
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E02, The Doctor and Ace explore King Arthur’s spaceship deep under Lake Vortigern, while Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart arrives in Carbury where he encounters Morgaine...
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E24, Guns found dumped in a pond help police to solve the 15-year-old murder of Detroit cab company owner. And the rape and murder of an Atlanta TV station receptionist goes cold for 20 years before DNA links a man to the crime.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.
MST3K: Robot Wars, 20220507000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).
MST3K: Munchie, 20220527000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch as a child befriends MUNCHIE (1992). Jonah refuses to go back into the theater and suffers the consequences.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.
MST3K: Demon Squad, 20220624000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.
MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger, 20220722000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.
MST3K: The Batwoman, 20220819000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).
MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru, 20220902000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.
MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come, 20220930000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

When Sparks Fly, 20140628000000 +0000, Fireworks go off when Amy Peterson comes home to help save her family's annual 4th of July celebration and discovers she loves the man she left behind years ago to pursue her dreams of becoming a journalist. Stars Meghan Markle.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.

Mom's Day Away, 20140510000000 +0000, Laura Miller is a happily married mother of two, but as Mother's Day draws near, Laura begins to feel unappreciated in her household. She escapes with her friend for a Mother's Day break in Napa.

Missing Pieces, 20000206000000 +0000, A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abby returns to Maryland when she receives a phone call from her sister.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part Two
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunion weekend continues.

programme.title: We're Not Losing a Son
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Abby settles in and starts her job at her firm's Baltimore office.

programme.title: We're Gaining a Daughter
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. As Kevin remains missing, the O'Brien family nervously wait for news.

programme.title: Georgia on My Mind
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. Kevin's fiance, Georgia, arrives in Chesapeake Shores.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.

programme.title: Hot Zone
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E13, A team of scientists are surveying the city for damage after the storm when they unknowingly release a virus causing hallucinations and death. The virus infects McKay, Zelenka, and Ford leaving Sheppard to stop it from spreading further.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E01, After Colonel Young and his military personnel are captured by the Lucian Alliance, Dannic abandons them on a nearby planet. Meanwhile on the ship, Dr. Rush, Brody, Chloe, and Eli attempt a risky plan to force the Lucians to surrender.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E02, With the need for food and water becoming dire, Dr. Rush manages to find a planet within range that seems viable but can only be accessed by shuttle. When nearing the planet, they encounter violent turbulence and must make a dangerous crash landing.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E03, The Destiny is on a collision course with an ancient ship found floating in space. Panic turns to wonder as the ships dock with each other. The crew discovers that it might hold the key to a connection back to Earth and other hidden secrets.

programme.title: Pathogen
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E04, On Destiny, Chloe's behavior has become a cause of concern and a worried Scott makes a shocking discovery while searching her quarters: a journal with Alien script. He shows it to Young and Rush who decide they must keep a constant eye on Chloe.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E16, SG-1 discovers that Nirrti is mutating the inhabitants of an unexplored planet with a machine that rearranges their DNA. Captured in an attempt to stop her, O'Neill must find a way to escape before he and SG-1 are subjected to the same fate.

programme.title: Disclosure
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E17, General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E18, SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E20, SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Prophecy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E21, SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E22, Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E01, As SG-1 begins its search for the Lost City, they discover that Jackson has been returned by the Ancients without any memory of who he was. While SG-1 tries to help him regain his memory, they discover that the Lost City is not on the same planet.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E02, Anubis travels to Kelowna after discovering that it has mines of a more powerful source of energy that he can use to make his new weapon more destructive. The leaders of Kelowna contact SG-1 for their help, but make an ill-advised deal with Anubis.

programme.title: Fragile Balance
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E03, A 15-year-old infiltrates the SGC with the startling news that he is Colonel Jack O'Neill, having mysteriously reverse aged 30 years overnight. Possessing O'Neill's knowledge, exact DNA and, above all, his attitude, can he really be O'Neill?

programme.title: Orpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E04, Through the help of Daniel, Teal'c visualizes that Rya'c and Bra'tac are being held prisoner in a Goa'uld death camp. With SG-1's help, Teal'c sets out to rescue his son and his mentor, but can he overcome his fears in time?

programme.title: Revisions
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E05, Six thousand light-years away, O'Neill and the SG-1 team discover a devastated universe where the inhabitants must live in a protective dome. They survive through an all-controlling computer system called the Link. But is it a savior, or a curse?

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E017, Brenda's had it with home life and West Beverly and decides to leave both for the real world.

programme.title: It's Only a Test
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E018, The Walsh twins and all their friends are panicked by the upcoming SATs, but then everything gets put in perspective when Brenda finds a lump in her breast and faces a test no one can prepare for.

programme.title: April Is the Cruelest Month
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E019, Brandon interviews a classmate, Roger, who's an outstanding athlete and student--and haunted by the overbearing success of his father.

programme.title: Spring Training
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E020, Baseball fever strikes when Brandon is asked to coach a little league team after his dad gets injured.

programme.title: Spring Dance
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S01E021, The drama and the stakes rise as the West Beverly High crew gets ready for their Spring Dance.

programme.title: Beach Blanket Brandon
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E001, Summer is here, and Brandon breaks the news to Nat that he is quitting his job at The Peach Pit.

programme.title: The Party Fish
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E002, Brandon sets his eyes on an older Beach Club worker, whose mysterious secrets make her even more appealing to him.

programme.title: Summer Storm

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S02E011, Brandon and Brenda's paraplegic cousin Bobby is visiting Beverly Hills - and Kelly finds him extremely interesting!

programme.title: Broken Promises
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E06, To avoid jail, Danny joins Team Baywatch. Leigh doesn't trust him. Kekoa battles her father over her lifeguard career and moves out. JD, Zack, and Jason hustle two gorgeous women who turn out to be con artists who turn the tables on them.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E07, Jenna convinces ruthless Councilman McKenna to close the Training Center. Sean suspends Zack after he severely injures JD during a rescue. Kekoa expresses her deep love for JD – but to Leigh! Zack sees a ghostly woman from his dreams.

programme.title: The Cage
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E08, Sean confronts a "shark tour" operator dangerously dumping chum to lure sharks. A tourist who wants to be a hero to impress his son keeps interfering with Jason's rescues. JD and Kekoa try to keep their passionate relationship a secret.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E09, Sean's incredible guilt after a surfing accident leads to a crisis of faith. Zack has to choose between loyalty to his Baywatch teammates and his competitive ambitions.

programme.title: Ties that Bind
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E10, Zack is devastated when Sean promotes Carrie instead of him. Zack and Jason befriend a man and his teenage daughter who harbor a dangerous secret. Zack supplies a boat to escape to Maui, but disaster strikes before they get there.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E11, Leigh suspects Sasha, an attractive tourist, of murdering her husband. Betraying Leigh, Jason seduces Sasha with shocking results! Sean is shocked when he discovers the truth about his ex-wife's visit to Hawaii.

programme.title: Ex-Files
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E12, A series of fake rescue calls puts Sean, Jenna and Zack’s lives in danger. Jenna replaces Councilman McKenna, giving her the power to shut down the Training Center! JD tries to get Kekoa’s father to bless their relationship.

programme.title: The Stalker
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E13, Carrie rescues a spearfisherman who starts obsessively stalking her. Sean, Jason, and Zack save her from his deadly pursuit, but can Carrie feel safe saving strangers again? Sean is jealous of Sam dating Leigh, but Leigh has doubts about Sam.

programme.title: Father Faust
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E14, Baywatch faces two bizarre lawsuits. Kekoa’s father wants her to break up with JD and quit lifeguarding. Zack runs the new Junior Lifeguards program. A government Investigation puts Sean’s job and the future of the Training Center in jeopardy.

programme.title: Good Man in a Storm
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E15, A hurricane hits Hawaii. Sean and Jenna get trapped in a WWII bunker and must put their hatred aside and work together to escape. Zack is trapped in headquarters with a thrill-seeking reporter that puts their lives in danger to get her story.

programme.title: My Father the Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E16, Jenna invests all her money with an investment banker who turns out to be a con man. Derek Hart is the kind of man JD wishes he was. But when Derek jumps off a cliff, JD and Jason dive in to save his life, in more ways than one!

programme.title: Boiling Point
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E17, Zack corrupts the headquarters’ computer system forcing everyone to work in the Dark Ages. Sean is freaked because a major donor is about to arrive in the midst of chaos. Jason saves Brit from her ex.

programme.title: The Return of Jessie
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E18, Kekoa is devastated when Jessie tells JD that he’s the father of her child. A rescued bodyboarder is paralyzed. Sean has a romantic encounter with a beautiful, woman he thinks might really be Pele, the goddess fire.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E19, Investigating toxic dumping, Sean and Leigh end up chained inside a chamber slowly filling with toxic seawater. Can Sam get them out in time? To raise money, Jason and Zack have to hula dance in grass skirts in front of a lot of women.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E20, Leigh takes over at Baywatch while Sean, Jason, and Zack go to compete in a 12-mile race of natural obstacles. Jessie’s presence at the race creates turmoil. Leigh and Jenna pretend to be lesbian lovers.

programme.title: Makapu'u Lighthouse
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E21, For a rescue, Sean is awarded a free week at Hilton Hawaiian Village, which he declines. Zack pretends he’s Sean and enjoys all the freebies until Sean shows up! A pretty fashion photographer thinks Jason has top model potential.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E22, Sean has a decision – move to Australia or stay in Hawaii. Zack sees Leigh naked, leading to complications with her fiancé Sam. Kekoa dumps JD and becomes a party girl. When Sam leaves Leigh at the altar, Sean asks Leigh to marry him instead.
